name: What Happened on the Moon?
storyline: After a few weeks of observing unusual activity originating from the Moon, Professor Ward assembles an AI Moon Rover to undertake a mission to investigate the cause. 3 months before the mission is due to launch, a man calling himself Dr. Hoffmann appears and takes control of the mission. Unable to stop him, Professor Ward must now rely solely on the rover to complete the mission and find out the truth...
summary: What happened on the Moon? is a short horror game where you control an AI Moon Rover on a mission to investigate mysterious activity on the lunar surface...
